name: ALAA-MOGUS MUST DIE
description:
• The slaves of Alaa-Mogus have become brutal in our world, URAANKHAI, we need to put them in their place

  • Letnik, Tuymaad Valley, Holiday Glade, Lake Saysar - our sacred places must be protected from Alaa-Mogus

  • Translations into Yakut and English languages

  • Don’t forget to drink BYYRPAKH and KYMYS for health and strength

  • YAKUT phonk in repertoire

  • Use different YAKUT techniques to shred the devils from the lower world

  • FIGHT the evil spirits from the OLONKHO epic face to face

  • Use various Yakut tools, such as a knife, batas, batyya, etc.



    URAANKHAI we are here?!

    URUY-AIKHAL! URUY-AIKHAL! URUY-AIKHAL! AYKHAL! AYKHAL!
